name: Spi Droid
overview: Spi Droid (also known as Spi-Droid) is a game in which you control a ball that has to go around a spooky maze (a bit similar to games like Marble Madness and SpinDizzy) in which the goal is to maneuver around the maze without falling off the sides. The game was developed and published by Vinsoft in 1989. You also have to contend with obstacles like larger balls, and an alien spaceship.
